private IEnumerator GestionScores(int[] scoresCibles)
{
    yield return new WaitForSeconds(1f);
    yield return StartCoroutine(DefileScore(scoresCibles, 1.5f));
    // Attendre que tout le monde soit pr√™t
    yield return StartCoroutine(SystemePret());
    yield return new WaitForSeconds(1f);
    
    // Gestion des jokers
    for (int i = 0; i < jockerList.Count; i++)
    {
        // Calcul du score avec le joker en cours
        List<PlayerTemp> listTemp = jockerList[i].UtilisationJoker();
        
        // Mise √† jour scores cibles
        for (int j = 0; j < nbJoueur; j++)
            foreach (var temp in listTemp)
                if (playerListAjout[j].clientId == (ulong)temp.clientId)
                    scoresCibles[j] = temp.score;
        
        // Animation joker
        bool isMystery = jockerList[i].mystere;
        if (isMystery)
            jokerImage.sprite = config.mystereSprite;
        else
            jokerImage.sprite = config.jokers[jockerList[i].priorite].sprite;
        
        yield return StartCoroutine(DefileScore(scoresCibles, 2f));
        yield return StartCoroutine(SystemePret());
        yield return new WaitForSeconds(0.2f);
    }
    
    // Mise √† jour serveur
    if (NetworkManager.Singleton.IsServer)
    {
        for (int i = 0; i < nbJoueur; i++)
        {
            for (int j = 0; j < nbJoueur; j++)
            {
                if (playerListAjout[i].clientId == playerList[j].clientId)
                {
                    var temp = playerList[j];
                    playerList.RemoveAt(j);
                    temp.score = scoreActuel[i];
                    playerList.Insert(j, temp);
                }
            }
        }
        
        PlayerData.Instance.ResetPlayerListsAjout();
        jockerList.Clear();
        skipButton.gameObject.SetActive(true);
    }
}
